articles.title: Blood Tests Of Immune Response May Be Key To Future COVID-19 Vaccine Development : Shots - Health News - NPR
articles.description: Researchers found that a class of antibodies in a monkey's blood provides protection from COVID-19. If that hold true for humans, a blood test may predict whether a vaccine candidate is working.
articles.content:
News of a good immune response in animals bodes well for testing future COVID-19 vaccines.
CMB/Getty Images
